languages.text: "Чувствую. Чувствую тяжесть невынесенных приговоров. Неисполненного... долга".
"I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of duty... unfulfilled."
languages.original_text: "Чувствую. Чувствую тяжесть невынесенных приговоров. Неисполненного... долга".

traits.locale_text: "I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of debt... unfulfilled."
"I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of debt... unfulfilled."
"I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of debt... unfulfilled."
"I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of duty... unfulfilled."
"I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of duty... unfulfilled."

languages.text: 「感じます。下されなかった判決の重みを。果たされなかった義務の…重みを」
languages.original_text: "I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of duty... unfulfilled."

traits.locale_text: 「感じます。下されなかった判決の重みを。果たされなかった義務の…重みを」

languages.text: "Doch. Ich spüre die Last nicht erfolgter Strafen. Nicht erfüllter Pflichten."
languages.original_text: "I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of duty... unfulfilled."

traits.locale_text: "Doch. Ich spüre die Last nicht erfolgter Strafen. Nicht erfüllter Pflichten."

languages.text: « Oui, c'est vrai. Je sens le poids de ces sentences qui ne seront jamais prononcées. Le fardeau du devoir... qui n'a pas été accompli. »
languages.original_text: "I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of duty... unfulfilled."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, c'est vrai. Je sens le poids de ces sentences qui ne seront jamais prononcées. Le fardeau du devoir... qui n'a pas été accompli. »

languages.text: «Así es. Siento el peso de las sentencias no ejecutadas. Del deber... incumplido».
languages.original_text: "I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of duty... unfulfilled."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Siento el peso de las sentencias no ejecutadas. Del deber... incumplido».

languages.text: “我感觉得到。我感觉到了沉重的责任，那些尚未宣判的罪行，那些……尚未完成的使命。”
languages.original_text: "I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of duty... unfulfilled."

traits.locale_text: “我感觉得到。我感觉到了沉重的责任，那些尚未宣判的罪行，那些……尚未完成的使命。”

languages.text: "Duyuyorum. Söylenmemiş cümlelerin ağırlığını hissediyorum. Yerine getirilmemiş vazifenin de..."
languages.original_text: "I do. I feel the weight of sentences undelivered. Of duty... unfulfilled."

traits.locale_text: Duyuyorum. Söylenmemeiş cümlelerin, ağırlığını hissediyorum. Ve de yerine getirilmemiş vazifenin..."
